thread.title: REFILE-BRIEF-Huachangda Intelligent Equipment's Unit Plans To Set Up Unit With Dearborn Holding, Shanghai Company

title: REFILE-BRIEF-Huachangda Intelligent Equipment's Unit Plans To Set Up Unit With Dearborn Holding, Shanghai Company

organizations.name: huachangda intelligent equipment group co ltd

text:
April 13, 2018 / 8:20 AM / in an hour REFILE-BRIEF-Huachangda Intelligent Equipment's Unit Plans To Set Up Unit With Dearborn Holding, Shanghai Company Reuters Staff 
(Refiles with correct link) 
April 13 (Reuters) - Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co Ltd: 
* SAYS ITS UNIT PLANS TO SET UP UNIT WITH REGISTERED CAPITAL OF 100 MILLION YUAN ($15.91 million) WITH U.S. FIRM DEARBORN HOLDING COMPANY AND SHANGHAI COMPANY Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HyfpD8 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2841 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
